name.ja: <ruby>七皇覚醒<rt>セブンス・フォース</rt></ruby>

text.en: During the Battle Phase, if a monster(s) is destroyed by battle or card effect: Target 1 "Number" Xyz Monster in your GY; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Number C" monster with the same Type as that monster but 1 Rank higher, and if you do, attach that monster to the Summoned monster as material, then, if you Summoned a monster with "Number C101" through "Number C107" in its name, you can add 1 "Barian's" Spell/Trap, "Rank-Up-Magic" Quick-Play Spell, or "Seventh" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Seventh Force".
